mining.title: LP MINING RIG
mining.subtitle: Deposit LP Token · Earn $NUTKIN rewards
mining.harvestNote: Trigger network payout • Earn operator commission
mining.sectionSubtitle: Stake LP tokens, earn $NUTKIN rewards. Simple, secure, and high-yield
mining.overviewDesc: Participate in liquidity mining by staking NUTKIN LP tokens, providing liquidity to the platform while earning generous $NUTKIN token rewards. Our mining system has been security audited to ensure the safety of your assets.
mining.feature1Desc: Deposit or withdraw your LP tokens at any time with no lock-up period
mining.feature2Desc: Earn rewards every block, check your earnings and withdraw anytime
mining.feature3Desc: Smart contracts are audited, all transactions are verifiable on-chain
mining.step1: Connect your wallet and deposit NUTKIN LP tokens worth at least $100
mining.step2: Mining starts automatically, producing 547,920 $NUTKIN tokens daily
mining.step3: Rewards are distributed proportionally based on LP holdings over 365 days, totaling 200M tokens
mining.infoDesc: Minimum LP deposit required is $100 worth of LP tokens. Mining rewards are dynamically distributed based on total network LP. The total mining period is 365 days, with a total supply of 200 million $NUTKIN tokens, producing 547,920 tokens daily. It is recommended to regularly harvest and reinvest your earnings to maximize returns.

tutorial.title: Tutorial Guide
tutorial.subtitle: Complete platform guide from wallet connection to trading and mining
tutorial.step1Desc: Install and connect UniSat, OKX or other supported Bitcoin wallets
tutorial.step2Desc: View real-time token prices, trading volume and market data
tutorial.step3Desc: Trade on DEX or participate in liquidity mining for rewards
tutorial.needHelpDesc: Join our community for more support and discussion

wallet.step1Desc: Visit UniSat, OKX or Xverse official website, download and install browser extension
wallet.step2Desc: Create a new wallet and securely save the seed phrase, or import an existing wallet
wallet.step3Desc: Click 'Connect Wallet' button at the top right, select your wallet type
wallet.step4Desc: Confirm the connection request in wallet popup to start using platform features

trading.step1Desc: Click 'DEX' in navigation or visit BestinSlot DEX website
trading.step2Desc: Choose the token pair you want to trade, such as NUTKIN/BTC
trading.step3Desc: Enter the amount to buy or sell, system will auto-calculate exchange amount
trading.step4Desc: Review trade details and submit, sign to confirm in your wallet

mining.step1Desc: Add liquidity on DEX to get NUTKIN LP tokens (minimum $100 value)
mining.step2Desc: Click 'Staking' in navigation or visit /mini mining page
mining.step3Desc: After connecting wallet, enter LP amount to deposit and confirm transaction
mining.step4Desc: Monitor mining rewards in real-time, withdraw anytime to your wallet

security.tip1Title: Protect Private Keys and Seed Phrases
security.tip1Desc: Never share your private keys or seed phrases with anyone, official team will never ask for them
security.tip2Desc: Ensure you're visiting the official website, beware of phishing sites and fake links
security.tip3Desc: Start with small amounts to familiarize yourself with the process before large transactions
security.tip4Desc: Regularly check wallet approval records and revoke unused contract permissions

faq.a1: Currently supports UniSat, OKX, Xverse, Leather and Magic Eden among other mainstream Bitcoin wallets.
faq.q2: What is the minimum mining amount?
faq.a2: Minimum LP deposit required is $100 worth of NUTKIN LP tokens.
faq.a3: 547,920 $NUTKIN tokens are produced daily, distributed proportionally based on your LP share of total network LP.
faq.a4: Yes, you can withdraw your LP tokens and earned mining rewards anytime without any lock-up period.
faq.a5: DEX trading fees are set by BestinSlot platform. Please visit the official website for the latest fee information.

miningGuide.title: LP Liquidity Mining Tutorial
miningGuide.subtitle: Detailed step-by-step guide from depositing BTC to start mining, easily participate in Nutkin token mining

step1.title: Deposit BTC via Smart Wallet
step1.desc1: First, visit BestinSlot official AMM website and click the Deposit button at the bottom right to deposit to your smart wallet. BIS smart wallet is bound to your main BTC wallet address, so no need to remember it separately. As long as you control your main wallet, your smart wallet is secure.
step1.tipDesc: Select BTC, enter amount, choose Gas fee rate (select fast for quicker confirmation), deposit and wait for block confirmation. After one block confirmation, you can see your BTC balance in the smart wallet.
step1.warningDesc: Minimum LP value required for mining is . If your smart wallet BTC balance is 0, it is recommended to deposit at least , with  for LP and remaining  for Gas fees.

step2.title: Deposit NUTKIN Tokens to Smart Wallet
step2.desc1: The process of depositing tokens is the same as depositing BTC. Click Deposit and select NUTKIN as the deposit option.
step2.noteDesc: Since the minimum LP value for token mining is , the token portion should be worth more than . For example, deposit 12,000 NUTKIN tokens and wait for block confirmation.

step3.title: Add LP and Withdraw
step3.desc1: After depositing BTC/NUTKIN, the smart wallet will display your BTC and token balances. Select the total LP amount you want to add. When selecting BTC, it will automatically pair equivalent BTC value of tokens, then select Add Liquidity.
step3.desc2: After adding, find Smart Wallet Balances and select Withdraw to extract LP Token (LP certificate) to your own wallet. When withdrawing the deposited LP, it will show Bis-AMM-V2. It is recommended to withdraw all (MAX) and wait for confirmation.

step4.title: Enter Yuzo Website to Prepare for Token Mining
step4.desc1: Go to Yuzo token mining interface and connect your wallet (e.g., UniSat wallet) at the top right.
step4.desc2: After connecting the wallet, you will see your LP Token balance. Select the amount you want (usually MAX), then click Start Mining. After successful signing, you will see Operation Complete message.
step4.successDesc: After completing the signature, wait for one block confirmation, then you can start earning NUTKIN token rewards.

analysis.title: In-depth Mining Model Analysis
analysis.intro: Currently, Nutkin LP total value has reached 6+ BTC, the largest LP pool in the BTC ecosystem. By building LP, you can get triple rewards:
analysis.benefit1Desc: Provide liquidity to the trading pool and earn continuous trading fee dividends
analysis.benefit2Desc: Automatically earn BIS points based on LP size and holding time, redeemable for future platform tokens
analysis.benefit3Desc: Use LP credentials to mine the remaining 20% tokens on Yuzo website, the earlier you participate, the more you get
analysis.modelDesc: The entire economic model has formed a flywheel effect. As the community develops, latecomers buy tokens to build LP  LP pool expands  token price rises  mining rewards increase  incentivizes more people to participate. Token mining portion accounts for 20% of total supply, enough to support one year of output. This is the first complete DeFi project in the BTC ecosystem!
